ya10.3.6:12.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti. Anāgāmī domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññindriyañca bhāvessati → āmantā (cck)
ya10.3.6:14.1: Cha → pañca (cck, pts-vp-pli1); cattāro (csp1ed) | puggalā → aṭṭhamako (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Pañca → tayo (csp1ed)
ya10.3.6:16.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti → āmantā (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ya10.3.6:18.1: Dve → cattāro (csp1ed) | Pañca → tayo (csp1ed) | Cha → cattāro (csp1ed) | . Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te → tayo puggalā (csp1ed)
ya10.3.6:42.1: . Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te → tayo puggalā (csp1ed)
